data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Hongrui, Xie, Yonghui, Li, Zhengyue (2012): A new leaf-feeding species of Neohydatothrips from southwestern China (Thysanoptera: Thripidae). Zootaxa 3180: 61-65, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.279973
